T02D2309:249a-0: @249a * // shan pa la gdams pa bzhugs /
T02D2309:249a-2: # // ae ma sangs rgyas ae ma chos //
T02D2309:249a-3: ae ma gtum po mdzad pa legs //
T02D2309:249b-0: ae ma gsod pa shin tu @249b zab //
T02D2309:249b-1: aa aa sdug bsngal gnas nas bsgral //
T02D2309:249b-2: rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig ste //
T02D2309:249b-3: gsal zhing dangs pa thugs kyi rigs //
T02D2309:249b-4: rno zhing rtsub pas 'bigs pa yang //
T02D2309:249b-5: gang la bsnun pas 'joms par byed //
T02D2309:249b-6: ma skyes rdo rje ye shes kyang //
T02D2309:249b-7: rno zhing 'bigs pa'i rang bzhin te //
T02D2309:249b-8: bsad cing phrin las drag po yis //
T02D2309:249b-9: gdug pa ma lus zhi bar mdzod //
T02D2309:249b-10: brtse zhing mkhas pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
T02D2309:249b-11: ci nus bsad pa'i sbyor ba brtsam //
T02D2309:249b-12: ngan song gsum du bka' stsal dang //
T02D2309:249b-13: bsgral ba'i gnas lngar grags pa dang //
T02D2309:249b-14: snying rje'i yul ni rnam pa gnyis //
T02D2309:249b-15: las dang dge bas bsdus pa'o //
T02D2309:249b-16: rang bzhin ye nas rnam dag kyang //
T02D2309:249b-17: ma rtogs nyon mongs dbang gis ni //
T02D2309:249b-18: khams gsum sdug bsngal myong 'gyur la //
T02D2309:249b-19: bsad pas thar bar bya phyir ro //
T02D2309:249b-20: de yi rig pa 'og min nam //
T02D2309:249b-21: sangs rgyas zhing las mi ldog pa'i //
T02D2309:249b-22: gnas su nges par byas pas ni //
T02D2309:249b-23: yon tan ldan pa'i gnas su'o //
T02D2309:249b-24: chos rnams ci yang min pa las //
T02D2309:249b-25: snying rjes bsad par dam bcas nas //
T02D2309:249b-26: chos kun 'dzin pa'i shes rab kyis //
T02D2309:249b-27: ji ltar rtogs shing goms pa las //
T02D2309:249b-29: sgrib pa sbyang zhing go 'phang bsgrod //
T02D2309:249b-30: sngags dang phyag rgya ldan pa yis //
T02D2309:249b-31: rgyal ba'i thugs rjes gsad par bya //
T02D2309:249b-32: de yis chos kun don gcig cing //
T02D2309:249b-33: de rtsal sgrib pa'i bag chags choms //
T02D2309:249b-34: shes rab ting 'dzin dam tshig nye //
T02D2309:249b-35: skye 'gyur dogs pa med pas bsad //
T02D2309:249b-36: de bsad mchod pa'i khyad par gyis //
T02D2309:249b-37: rdo rje mkha' 'gro la sogs mnyes //
T02D2309:249b-38: de 'ong sems can don bya ste //
T02D2309:249b-39: sdug bsngal gnas bsgral bsod nams tshogs //
T02D2309:249b-40: rang sems khyad par dam tshig nye //
T02D2309:249b-41: bdag don phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T02D2309:249b-42: ngan 'gro rnams kyi sgrib pa sbyangs //
T02D2309:249b-43: bsad pas byang chub lam la bkod //
T02D2309:249b-44: gzhan don lhun gyis grub pa'o //
T02D2309:249b-45: de ltar shes rab chen po yis //
T02D2309:249b-46: dngos 'dzin rdul tsam ma dmigs la //
T02D2309:249b-47: thabs su ma gyur gang yang med //
T02D2309:249b-48: mnyam par shes nas ci dga' gyis //
T02D2309:249b-49: ngang las ma g-yos snying rje yis //
T02D2309:249b-50: sna tshogs mdzad pa ston par byed //
T02D2309:250a-0: @250a * // gsod pa'i sbyor ba goms pa yis //
T02D2309:250a-1: sgyu ma lta bu'i tshul shes nas //
T02D2309:250a-2: yod med dmigs pa las 'das pas //
T02D2309:250a-3: log rtog tsam la srog tu snang //
T02D2309:250a-4: srog kyang med la gcang bya med //
T02D2309:250a-5: srog ni dngos por lta ba dang //
T02D2309:250a-6: mtshan mar zhen pa rnams la snang //
T02D2309:250a-7: de ltar mtshan ma bral ba dang //
T02D2309:250a-8: snying rje'i blo can rnams la min //
T02D2309:250a-9: de ltar shes la spong len nam //
T02D2309:250a-11: sgyu ma lta bu'i spyod pa yis //
T02D2309:250a-12: de ma rtogs pa'i 'gro ba rnams //
T02D2309:250a-13: ma lus rgyal ba'i sa la 'god //
T02D2309:250a-14: gtum po rang gi gnas na 'gying //
T02D2309:250a-15: dpa' bos g-yul las rgyal bar byed //
T02D2309:250a-16: nags kyi mun pa me yis bsreg / dug mtsho'i sle la bdud rtsis myos //
T02D2309:250a-17: sngon gyi thugs dam chen po yis //
T02D2309:250a-19: rgyal ba'i zhing du sbyor bas na //
T02D2309:250a-20: bsad pa'i sbyor ba shes par byos //
T02D2309:250a-21: gzhi rtsa bral ba'i skad cig la //
T02D2309:250a-22: yang dag sgyu ma'i tshul du snang //
T02D2309:250a-23: bdag dang gzhan gyi rang bzhin rnams //
T02D2309:250a-24: rnam dag dbyings su tshul gcig go //
T02D2309:250a-25: rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug ti lli pas //
T02D2309:250a-26: rigs ngan gtum mo'i grong khyer du shan pa la
T02D2309:250a-27: gdams pa gsod pa'i sbyor ba bsam gyis mi khyab
